title: Annelid worms
brief_description: The following are studied: land earthworms, freshwater and saltwater aquatic worms; medicinal and pond leeches; numerous marine polchaet worms; and the most primitive type of annelid larva is illustrated by a study of the trochophore larva. No other credits available.
